fullText:
Imperious Majesty

Prerequisite: Tiefling
Benefit: You can use Charisma instead of Dexterity to determine your initiative modifier. When you hit a creature that has not yet acted in an encounter with an attack, it takes a penalty to attack rolls against you equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381, page(s) 87.
